post:
I just want to put an offer out for NAT based OpenVZ VPS's and Dedicated IPv4 VPS's also. We try to provide a friendly and positive experience. Let’s get down to the business.

Just some things to let everyone know how transparent we are:

      Support is not 24/7 (Normal hrs. CST 8am-11pm)
      All orders are manual verified
      Setup time frame can take upwards of 24hrs (Usually quicker) 
      If you got a question please open a ticket! 
      All vps's are on a FAIR SHARE usage policy of the CPU CORES within certain limits. (TOS)
      We use SolusVM for the control panel.
      Our main website is being worked on by a web designer
      Port 25 is blocked on all PLAN's

Location of the nodes:

       Immedion Datacenter located in Asheville, NC. 
       NL Evoswitch AMS-01 located in Amsterdam.
       Test IP for US: 208.83.142.198 
       Test IP for NL: 94.75.223.121

Node Specs in both locations:

        E-3 1230v2
        32 gigs of ram
        4x1tb drives in SW Raid 10
        1 Gbit uplink

Payment Processor: Paypal or Bitpay
    
      64M ram / 64M VSWAP
      20 gigs of diskspace (Raid 10)
      300 gigs of bw @ 1Gbps 
      NAT ipv4 19 ports / 1 ssh
